```{r}
library(data.table)
library(bigsnpr)
library(bigstatsr)
```

```{r}
bed <- snp_attach('noNA0.01maf.rds')
G<- bed$genotypes
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

ind.train <- sample(nrow(G),nrow(G)/2)

ind.test.vaild <- setdiff(rows_along(G),ind.train)

ind.vaild<- sample(ind.test.vaild, length(ind.test.vaild)/2)

ind.test<- setdiff(ind.test.vaild,ind.vaild)
```

```{r}
snp_writeBed(bed,'noNA0.01maf_train.bed',ind.row = ind.train)
snp_writeBed(bed,'noNA0.01maf_test.bed',ind.row = ind.test)
snp_writeBed(bed,'noNA0.01maf_vaild.bed',ind.row = ind.vaild)
```

```{r}
#Check it's rows if splitting is done
train_fam <- read.table('noNA0.01maf_train.fam')
nrow(train_fam)
```
